name: Save the last Plant
description:
This game was made during the Ludum-Dare 46, with the theme "Keep it alive". The Player controlls a shooting robot, to Protect the last plant on earth. Use  arrowkeys r WASD to move and the right MouseButton to shoot.

Have Fun and enjoy your Ludum-Dare-Experience.

P. S. if you are interested in any of the Code, be aware it´s messy.

 I used: 

- AstarPathFindingProject

- Roboto-Font
